description: This is the main source file for a Flutter application, defining the app's entry point, main widget, and home page with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets up the MaterialApp theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page, with a title property.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the Scaffold with AppBar and loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, calls runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, returning widget trees.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
